name: Power Protect 1.1
description:
Make sure to go in the full screen mode while playing!!!!!!!

Controls - AD to move, Space to shoot

Goal: Protect the Power Generator from little bubbly enemies coming to eat its energy. Shoot wisely as you can only shoot one bullet at a time and can only shoot another after the first bullet hits an enemy and the player reloads.

Experience a fun and chaotic 2D shooter, play easily on your browser and don't forget to leave a like if you like it and comment your thoughts.

PS. my high score is 652 so if you do beat it comment and I'll try to beat yours!!!

This games is the updated version of game of the same name summitted for Mini-Game-Jam 73, with bugs resolved and new features added in.
